en: Reporter Leslie Ackerson was by herself to do an 11:00 a.m. report from a neighborhood near the fires. She talked about how bad the air quality was and how the little kids had to stay inside during recess. At first, it was a small fire and people didn’t know the fire could be a problem. It was still far away. The wind, dust, and leaves created hazy darkness by late afternoon.

This video examines Paige Braddock's artwork "No Children at Recess", which was inspired by the experiences of Leslie Ackerson during the Chimney Tops 2 Wildfires.
